quest.name: Systematic Exploration
journal: Cid looks like a man with a plan.
Having established a base camp, Cid suggests that you find one of the terminals connected to the isle's operational heart. Search the area for an active terminal.
Your search has yielded nothing. Return to base camp and report to Cid.
As he ponders your report, Cid notices with a start that Wedge has wandered off without a word. Help him find his absent-minded colleague before trouble does.
You find Wedge, who in his turn has found a curious spherical...thing, which turns out to be a “guidance node.” Ask Cid what he makes of this discovery.

With a little prompting, the node furnishes you with a destination: the Aetherochemical Research Facility, situated upon the Flagship. Though it is unclear what the archbishop seeks in the area marked “Triad Control,” you can be sure no good will come of it.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: First of all, in the interests of efficiency, I suggest we make this place our base camp. We can coordinate the search for the archbishop from here.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I have no objections. Now that we stand upon Azys Lla, I am struck by the vastness of the isle. We must needs be methodical if we are to find our quarry.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Good. Now, unless I'm mistaken, this used to be an airship landing, and a major one at that. From what I know of Allagan design, there should be a terminal nearby that's linked to the isle's operational heart.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: If we can find such a terminal, we should be able to learn something of the archbishop's whereabouts. Let's split up and look for it.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: This terminal has long since ceased to function. Search for another.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: It's still active─all of it...

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Crikey... This place is like something out of my dreams...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Cid is right. We owe it to Ysayle to see the mission through.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: I sense an ominous presence...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Heavy though our hearts may be, we must forge on─in the name of those we have lost.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I daresay this landing could accommodate even a Ragnarok-class vessel... Remarkable.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: What ungodly vessels must the Allagans have built to warrant so vast a landing?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: To think that such a massive structure has been floating above our heads for all these millennia... It beggars belief...

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: The Empire borrowed most of its technology from Allagan relics. If we can find the terminal, I reckon we can operate it.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: This place is an engineer's playground. If I had the time, I'd be going over it with a bleedin' magnifying glass.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Machines are beyond my ken─I shall leave it to the others to find this “terminal.” Of more concern to me are the dragons that I sense nearby.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: This ominous presence... To whom does it belong?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Alas, I have found naught of use.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: ...Nothing? Damn it. There's just this terminal, then, but it doesn't respond to anything I do. Any bright ideas, Wedge?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: ...Wedge? He was here just a moment ago. Oh, don't tell me he's wandered off...

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, Forename, but could you help me search for him? Absent-minded as he is, I worry that he's strayed beyond the landing area, and made friends with the local sentinels.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: I need you to help me search for Wedge. Absent-minded as he is, I worry that he's strayed beyond the landing area, and made friends with the local sentinels.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Owww...

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Wedge! Are you all right!?

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: I-I'm fine, Chief. I just tripped, that's all.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Fool of a Lalafell! What were you thinking, coming here on your own!? Death by overwork is one thing─death by stupidity quite another!

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, Chief... B-But I think I've found something!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: What is this? The wreck of a sentinel?

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: This is no wreck, Chief! She's still operational!

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: See?

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text:
<blip> Initiating...
Performing diagnostics...
<blip> Diagnostics complete.
To proceed, please agree to the terms and conditions of use.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Do you agree?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I...suppose?

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text: Thank you. To register as a user, please state your name.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: I'm Wedge, and that there is Forename!

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> User registration complete. Welcome to Azys Lla, Master Wedge and MistressMaster Forename. I am Guidance Node G-LI.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Hm. This isn't quite what I had in mind, but it might just serve.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Wedge, bring the node this way, would you? There's something I'd like to try.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Node! I need a status report on the facility!

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Gilly! You have to do what the chief says!

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Yes, that's it! Good girl!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Ah, here we are... Hmmm, not much of note. It appears someone recently reactivated “Helix,” which is this area.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Reactivated, you say?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: By the archbishop, I'd wager. I daresay he woke the place up when he used the Vanu's key.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Are there any other people in the facility? If so, where?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Let's see here... On the “Flagship”─that's the central isle─I'm seeing positive readings within the Aetherochemical Research Facility and the Fractal Continuum...

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: And what have we here? Intruders detected in the Gamma Quadrant, defense system engaged.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Our imperial friends, I suspect. I hope they enjoy the defense system. But what of the archbishop and his cronies?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Hmmm, what might offer an indication? ...Ah! How about this: which area is currently consuming the most energy?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: ...Somewhere called “Triad Control,” inside the research facility.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: And what manner of place is that?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: It is, and I quote, “a regulation facility for the 'Warring Triad' test subjects.” And that's all it says. The rest of the information is only accessible to users with consular privileges.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I mislike the sound of this...which leads me to believe that it is indeed the place.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I am inclined to agree with Y'shtola. Whatever it is that the archbishop seeks, it is like to be there.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: That settles it, then. Let's find a way to cross over to the Flagship.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: That fool of a Lalafell, always making us worry... And he's already gone and named the node! Can you believe it?

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: I'm sorry... I promise to be more careful from now on...

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> Greetings, MistressMaster Forename. Is there something you wish to know?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: This device serves as an aetheryte, yet it is not made of crystal. To think that the Allagans could emulate the properties of so fundamental a substance...

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Did you find anything?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: No. Nothing at all.

obj.n: The First Flight of the Excelsior
